scripts.clean:all: rimraf frontend/dist backend/dist node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules
scripts.build: pnpm build:frontend && pnpm build:backend && pnpm postbuild
scripts.format: pnpm --filter frontend format && pnpm --filter backend format
scripts.format:check: pnpm --filter frontend format:check && pnpm --filter backend format:check
